boardgame.name: Star Wars: The Queen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Gambit
boardgame.description: Based on the four battles at the end of Star Wars Episode One: The Phantom Menace -- the battle on the plain between the Gungan forces and the droid army; the attempt by Naboo forces, led by Queen Amidala, to storm the palace and capture the Trade Federation viceroys; the fight between Darth Maul and the two Jedi Knights; and the space battle in which Anakin's starfighter destroyed the Droid Control Ship._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The forces are represented by 155 plastic miniatures on three separate boards, including a three-level palace. The action is driven by two decks of cards for each side. Each turn, each side simultaneously chooses four action cards from a hand of ten, and places them in order. The actions are then carried out one at a time, alternating sides. Combat is resolved using special attack and defense dice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2001 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Two-players
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Ep 33 STAR WARS with Alex Eding
Episode 54 :: Yokohama Review + Questions from the hat with Cat
OBG 011: Not Your Father_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Games
TDT - Episode # 322 - Games from our Childhood
Vox Republica 106: BGG Con And Solo Conventioning

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

listing.notes: Box has been opened but the game is unplayed. All pieces are present and in excellent condition.
Shipping is 12.00$ within U.S., insurance 1.30$ opotional.
Still in shrink.

This is a brand new, still in shrink copy of Star Wars--The Queen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Gambit. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m willing to ship anywhere (due to the fact that the buyer pays shipping ; ) ). If you live outside the USA, please suggest a shipping company that you like. PayPal is great, and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll ship it same or next day after I receive it. Checks and money orders are okay as well, but I have to wait for them to clear before shipping. I estimate that shipping costs to US locations should be about $13 for USPS priority mail.

Game is out of print and still in shrink. Warning - this game is too heavy to ship in an up to 2 kg surface package. So shipping migh be quite costly depending on destination. Shipping at actual cost dependend on destination, total weight and method of shipment chosen. Usually shipping a single (regular sized) boardgame (surface) costs 12.90€ worldwide and 8.60€ within Europe. Smaller games ship cheaper. Of course multiple games can be combined.
Box has been open and has some minor shop ware, overall it is very good. The game pieces have been taken out of the wrappers but, it seem the game has not been played.

New, still in shrink wrapped. I accept paypal or international bank transfer. Contact me for shipping details. We will work out the best / Cheapest option for you depending on your target country and your preferences.
Punched, but never played. Big game with lots of fun bits!
Punched, played only once. Box has some shelf wear and moisture bubbling. Contents are mint.
Opened, punched, and enjoyed.
Brand new and sealed! Please contact me if you would like a quote on shipping cost or have a specific question regarding the game. I will only charge you for my actual shipping and packaging costs.
Shrinked, stored with care. Never been touched.

Contents punched and played once or twice, but complete and in excellent condition. Box is also in excellent structural condition, marred only by a small dent in one corner and minor shelfwear on bottom and back side. Downgraded to Acceptable due to some figures being stained by the bleeding-red color from other figures. Normally this would not affect gameplay; however, some of the green damage counters were stained, one of which is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;secret_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Queen Amadala counter. These would need to be cleaned or painted over to match the others.

A solid, complete copy of the game that I have double-verified all component totals against the amounts shown in the included rule book. The cards, boards, rules, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s all there, and then some, as you can see listed below. The box lid has minor cosmetic damage, but rule book, boards, and miniatures are all in great shape. I have several pictures I can e-mail you if interested. Only issue I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve noted with the game is one of the Theed Palace cards has a slight crease off to the side, but it didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t affect our gameplay at all. This is a really neat game that I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve been holding onto for several years but our other hobbies (fishing and boating) have taken the center stage for the time being. The Queen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Gambit came with a huge amount of components, but this copy came with many extra miniatures, as listed below. Along with those extras, I am also including two laminated player aid sheets that I downloaded from BGG that helps speed play up if you are not familiar with the game. Extra miniatures included: 1 extra Multi-troop Transport (4 total) 1 extra Battle Droid (66 total) 1 extra Catapult (4 total) 1 extra Captain Panaka (2 total) 2 extra Viceroy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s (4 total) 1 extra Naboo Fighter stand (note, an extra stand only, not an extra ship) (2 total) 1 extra 1st player marker (2 total) 1 extra Armored Attack Tank (5 total) 1 extra Fambas (3 total) 2 extra green counters (11 total) 1 extra Destroyer Droid (13 total) 1 extra Gungan (28 total) 1 extra Palace Guard (22 total)
